name: Zai
greetingText: I feel really cheerful when calling your name!
wishText: Good luck in the year ahead! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!!! Goodluck and great successin the coming New year
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But you're far away from me.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: 我是第一个祝你生日快乐的贝幺~
